briefTitle: Study to Assess Functionality, Reliability, and Performance of a Single-Use Auto-Injector With Benralizumab Administered at Home
officialTitle: A Multicenter, Open-Label, Functionality, Reliability and Performance Study of a Single-Use Auto-Injector With Home-administered Subcutaneous Benralizumab in Adult Patients With Severe Asthma (GRECO)
summary: The purpose of the study is to assess functionality, performance, and reliability of an single-use auto-injector (AI) with benralizumab administered subcutaneously (SC) in an at-home setting reported by the patient or caregiver, and to confirm the safety and clinical benefit of benralizumab administration in asthma patients with severe asthma

primaryOutcome.measure: Number of Patients/Caregivers Who Successfully Administered Benralizumab 30 mg Subcutaneously (SC) by Injection With an AI Device at Home
